snippet: Fran Drescher’s longtime — and since dissolved — marriage to her husband, who is gay, inspired her to become a minister so that she can legally join gay and lesbian couples in marriage.
abstract: Actress and comedian Fran Drescher is inspired by her own life story, in which her ex-husband came out as gay but still remains close friends with her, to become an ordained minister so that she can legally join gay and lesbian couples in marriage.
lead_paragraph: Fran Drescher’s longtime — and since dissolved — marriage to her husband, who is gay, inspired her to become a minister so that she can legally join gay and lesbian couples in marriage.

headline.seo: Fran Drescher Strives to Wed Gay Couples
headline.main: Still Dictating Orders, This Time at the Altar
headline.print_headline: Still Dictating Orders, This Time at the Altar

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
